taDuoc: citric acid khan, natri hydrogen carbonat, natri carbonat khan, mannitol lactose khan, ascorbic acid, natri cyclamat, saccharin natri, natri citrat 2 H20, hương việt quất "B" (có chứa hương wildberry, hương blackbery, vanillin, maltodextrin, mannitol, gluconolacton, sorbitol, magie carbonat, silica colloidal khan)
